com.braincadet.vess
Class Frangi

java.lang.Object
  com.braincadet.vess.Frangi

public class Frangi
extends java.lang.Object

Frangi's vesselness implementation.

Frangi, Alejandro F., et al. "Multiscale vessel enhancement filtering." International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 1998.

The Frangi class runs Frangi's vesselness for selected byte8 2d/3d image.

Calculates the vesselness measure and the eigenvectors.

The implementation was inspired and uses MEX and Matlab samples ported from

Hessian based Frangi vesselness filter

Since:
2017-03-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Miroslav Radojevic

Constructor Detail

Frangi

public Frangi(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> sigs,
              float zdist,
              float alpha,
              float beta,
              float C,
              float beta_one,
              float beta_two,
              boolean blackwhite)
Class constructor: Frangi's vesselness computation.

Parameters:
#sigs - List of Gaussian sigma values expressing the scales for the vesselness computation.
zdist - z-distance between image stack layers in pixels (3d, image stack parameter)
alpha - Vesselness parameter (3d)
beta - Vesselness parameter (3d)
C - Vesselness parameter (3d)
beta_one - Vesselness parameter (2d)
beta_two - Vesselness parameter (2d)
blackwhite - Vesselness parameter

Frangi

public Frangi(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> sigs)
Frangi's vesselness computation class constructor with the default parameter values.

zdist = 2.0f (3d) z-dim anisotropy

alpha = 0.5f (3d)

beta = 0.5f (3d)

C = 500f (3d)

BetaOne = 0.5f (2d)

BetaTwo = 15f (2d)

darkforeground = false (black foreground, white background)

Parameters:
sigs - ArrayList with Gaussian cross section standard deviations corresponding to the scales

run3d_byte

public byte[] run3d_byte(byte[] I,
                         int w,
                         int h,
                         int l,
                         byte[] Vx,
                         byte[] Vy,
                         byte[] Vz,
                         boolean is_threaded)
Vesselness computation for image stack (3d).

Parameters:
I - Input image stack in 1-d byte array
w - Image stack width
h - Image stack height
l - Image stack size
Vx - Output image stack with eigen vector x-component. Byte values [0,255] range.
Vy -
Vz -
is_threaded - Use threading flag.
Returns:
Vesselness image stack saved in 1-d byte array [0,255]

run2d_byte

public byte[] run2d_byte(byte[] I,
                         int w,
                         int h,
                         int l,
                         byte[] Vx,
                         byte[] Vy,
                         byte[] Vz)
Vesselness computation for image (2d).

Parameters:
I - Input image in 1-d byte array (accepts only Byte8 images)
w - Image width
h - Image height
l - Image size
Vx - Eigen vector x-component (skipped for Vx==null)
Vy - Eigen vector y-component (skipped for Vy==null)
Vz - Eigen vector z-component (skipped for Vz==null)
Returns:
Vesselness image saved in 1-d byte array
